dmca.title: Liturgy publisher doesn't turn the other cheek
dmca.body:
21 May 2007 

Attn: Blogger Legal Support, DMCA Complaints 

I wish to report publication of copyright material that belongs to the International Commission on English in the Liturgy, [private], 20005 Washington DC., and to request that such material be removed 

The material in question is an English translation of the Order of Mass, which has been published on the following web pages: 

http://newmasstexts.blogspot.com/search?updated-min=2007-01-01T00%3A00%3A00-08%3A0 0&updated-max=2008-01-01T00%3A00%3A0008%3A00&max-results=l 

http://newmasstexts.blogspot.com/2007/04_01_archive.html 
http://newmasstexts.blogspot.com/2007/04/gray-book.html 

I can be contacted at the above address, or at [Private]@eliturgy.org. 

have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted material described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. 

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that lam the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. 

[Private], 
Executive Director of the Secretariat, 
International Commission on English in the Liturgy.
dmca.principal_name: The International Commission on English in the Liturgy
